title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
description: When defining a drill through link and selecting a target bookmark, the bookmark link set should be saved and visible in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: Currently, after defining a drill through link with a target bookmark selected, the bookmark link set is not saved or displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a drill through link is defined with a target bookmark selected, the selected bookmark link should be saved and visible in the Hyperlink Options dialog for further editing and reference.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the drill through link configuration.
2. Define a new drill through link.
3. Select a target bookmark.
4. Save the drill through link.
5. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog for the saved link.
6. Observe that the selected bookmark link is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
